Education 
Degrees: BA of Economics & Computer Science
Concentration: Models & Methods
Relevant Courses: Data Structures, Applied Statistics, Econometrics, Software Design & Implement, Differencial Equations, Calculus I&II, International Trade & Policy, Intermediate Macroeconomics
Expected Graduation: May 2025
School: Berea College – Berea, KY
GPA: 3.83
Honors: Dean’s List for Academic Achievement, Spring 2022, 2023
Work Experience 
Data Science Research Intern

DSPG Program at Virginia Tech - Blacksburg, VA



Completed a 10-weeks research project on the effect of flooding in Bangladesh with other 2 undergrad and 2 grad students.
Cleaned and reshaped the Bangladesh Integrated Household Survey (BIHS) data
Used GEE and Python to get access, compile and visualize satellite flood and rainfall data from Sentinel 1, the Global Flood Database and CHIRPS
Built an interactive web dashboard where our findings are hosted for public consumption


Teaching Assistant

Berea College Economics and Business Department – Berea, KY



Tutored 25 students in principles of Microeconomics by helping them understand concepts taught in class, complete homework, and prepare for exams
Graded homework assignments using the learning management system, Moodle, giving students feedback and helping reinforce course concepts
Assisted in putting together class material and quizzes and homework for principles of Microeconomics class
Lead workshops to help students refresh their math skills to enhance their performance in coursework and projects


Office Assistant

Berea College Student Financial Aid Services – Berea, KY



Provided front-line customer service to 1,600 students who needed financial aid services by answering phone calls, emails, and scheduling appointments for six Financial Aid professionals
Managed confidential financial documents, including scanning / printing / filing students’ financial documents and scholarship packages


Extracurricular Activities 
Co-Founder & Secretary
> Berea College Economic Association (BEA) - Berea, KY


Represented our association at the Berea College Fall 2022 involvement fair and recruited 20 new members
Planned our field trip to Cincinnati, OH, for 10 people



Co-Founder, TotaharaBurundi Environmental Association – Burundi



Organized weekly Tanganyika beach cleanup and annual tree-planting campaigns to promote environmental awareness
Taught recycling to local communities to promote healthy waste disposal methods


Skills 
Technical Skills:


Proficiency in R: Familiar with data manipulation, visualization and presentation using Tidyverse, Plotly, Leaflet, Shiny packages and R Markdown,
Intermediate in Python: Familiar with inheritance, classes, TKinter, unit testing, and debugging existing codes,
Project workflow management: Familiar Git and GitHub,
Geospatial analysis: Accessing and compiling remotely sensed data using Google Earth Engine and visualizing them in R and Python.


Soft Skills:


Presentation skills: Presented and communicate goals for technical projects to government and academic officials,
Technical reading: Conducted literature Review on using climate data to conduct policy analysis,
Languages: English, French, Kirundi, and Kinyarwanda (Full Proficiency) and Swahili (Elementary Proficiency)


Interpersonal Skills:


Value teamwork,
Organized,
Creative,
Always willing to learn

            Biography
            Coming from Burundi, one of the world’s poorest
            countries, I embarked on a remarkable journey as a
            first-generation college student fueled by a relentless
            determination to pursue higher education. My background and
            experiences have only intensified my passion for utilizing
            technology, particularly data analytics and modeling, to
            advocate for rural and marginalized communities. Throughout
            my academic journey, I have actively engaged in research
            projects and undertaken extracurricular activities that
            empower these communities, all while staying abreast of the
            rapidly evolving field of technology.
            As I progress in my higher education journey, I am now
            eagerly seeking any opportunity for internships, research
            positions, or jobs that can provide me with the valuable
            professional experience I need. I am confident that these

Project 1 
Title: Data science research - DSPG Program
Team: Sotaire Kwizera, Riya Pulla, Jade Nguyen,Nandini Das, Naveen Abedin
Description
During my 10-weeks internship with the Data Science for Public Good (DSPG) program, my team and I conducted a preliminary study of prenatal exposure to flooding and child health outcomes. We accomplished this by combining flood statistics, from remotely sensed satellite data, with household-level survey data to produce a collection of descriptive statistics detecting trends. This allowed us to gain a comprehensive understanding of how flooding impacts pregnant and their children. All our findings were finally compiled into a into interactive Shiny App web dashboard for easy public access on the web.

Project 2 
Title: My Personal Website
Description
Welcome to my personal website! Here, I’ve crafted this platform with two primary objectives in mind:
Demonstrating the Versatility of R Studio: Beyond its traditional use for statistical analysis and data visualization, I aim to showcase the immense potential of R Studio in creating aesthetically pleasing and functional websites. By harnessing the power of R Studio’s web development capabilities, I’ve designed this site as an example of what can be achieved when creativity meets coding.
Having my Portfolio out there on the web: Rather than merely telling the world what I can do, I believe in showing it through tangible examples. Thus, this website serves as a living portfolio, showcasing my skills and projects to the global audience. Here, you’ll find a detailed collection of my works, illustrating my experiences and passion across various domains.
